description: As a seasoned software solutions engineer with over 5 years of experience, I have a proven track record of designing and implementing robust and scalable software solutions. I specialize in SQL database solutions troubleshooting Stored procedures, embedded algorithms and dealing with backup & restore processes. My skills in agile project management, continuous integration and delivery, and DevOps practices have helped me deliver high-quality solutions on-time and within budget.
skills: Experience with Microsoft applications, such as Office 365, SharePoint, Teams, Dynamics 365, and Power Platform
Testing and deployment to UAT & Live productions
Experience with Transactions, audit and accounting software applications
Experience with IT/application support in the Pharma & Healthcare industries
detailOrQuote: I am a strong communicator, both with technical and non-technical stakeholders, and have experience leading cross-functional teams. My problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to think critically allow me to quickly identify and address complex issues.
detailOrQuote2: I am passionate about staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, and I continuously seek to learn and grow my skills. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and have obtained AWS certifications.
detailOrQuote3: If you're looking for a software solutions engineer who can lead your team to success and deliver innovative solutions, look no further. Contact me today to learn more about how I can help your organization achieve its goals.
